name: Trials of the Moth
description:
I made this game while participating in a 2-day jam with other ISU students, check out their games as well on the jam page!

Controls

WASD - move

Spacebar - jump

middle mouse button + move mouse - rotate the camera

left mouse - light attack

right mouse - heavy attack

scroll - zoom in/out

'e' - interact/pick up potions

credits

MUSIC

Skye Cuillin by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4371-skye-cuillin
